text: Virender Kanwar is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly from Kutlehar in the 2003, 2007, 2012 and 2017 Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He is Minister of Rural Development, Panchayati Raj, Animal Husbandry and Fisheries in Jai Ram Thakur cabinet. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Himachal Pradesh Legislative Assembly Category:Himachal Pradesh MLAs 2017– Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Himachal Pradesh
title: Virender Kanwar
